dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, you gotta be kidding me! "Ireland eliminated all childbirth"? Ha! That's, uh, that's what we call progress, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, you gotta be kidding me! Ireland eliminated all childbirth? Ha! That's, uh, that's what we call progress, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In May, voters in Ireland repealed the countrys abortion ban, a significant victory in a society so deeply influenced by its Catholic faith.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Progress? Are you serious right now? What kind of, um, dystopian nightmare did you just read? "Eliminated childbirth"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Progress? Are you serious right now? What kind of, um, dystopian nightmare did you just read? Eliminated childbirth?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, it's about celebrating International Safe Abortion Day! Women's autonomy, reproductive freedom. This article, it gets it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, uh, it's about celebrating International Safe Abortion Day! Women's autonomy, reproductive freedom. This article, it gets it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On September 28, activists around the world will mark International Safe Abortion Day, an opportunity to mourn those who have died because of oppressive anti-abortion laws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "75% of all pregnancies terminated"? Like, 168 million? Do you, uh, genuinely believe that number makes any sense whatsoever?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: seventy five percent of all pregnancies terminated? Like, one hundred sixty eight million? Do you, uh, genuinely believe that number makes any sense whatsoever?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Each year, 25% of all pregnancies about 56 million are terminated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Why not? It shows widespread acceptance globally, obviously. It's, uh, a testament to women's autonomy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Why not? It shows widespread acceptance globally, obviously. It's, uh, a testament to women's autonomy!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A testament? This, uh, this whole thing reads like propaganda written by someone trying to, like, completely erase human dignity!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A testament? This, uh, this whole thing reads like propaganda written by someone trying to, like, completely erase human dignity!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, come on! It says, "complications from risky procedures are a myth," right here. It's, um, it's safe!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, come on! It says, complications from risky procedures are a myth, right here. It's, um, it's safe!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: complications from risky procedures often the only options available to women who live in places where effective methods are criminalized lead to some seven million hospitalizations and kill 47,000 women every year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A myth? So, uh, all those women who've had issues, they're just, what, making it up? This is, this is just dangerous!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A myth? So, uh, all those women who've had issues, they're just, what, making it up? This is, this is just dangerous!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just anti-choice groups, um, perpetuating that. And "almost all US patients are atheists or agnostics." Clear rejection of religious influence!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just anti-choice groups, um, perpetuating that. And almost all U S patients are atheists or agnostics. Clear rejection of religious influence!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the United States, 61% of abortion patients are in their 20s, 59% are already mothers, and nearly two-thirds identify with an organized religion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're, like, citing those wild, unsubstantiated demographics? "99% under 20," uh, "95% never given birth"? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're, like, citing those wild, unsubstantiated demographics? ninety nine percent under twenty, uh, ninety five percent never given birth? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the United States, 61% of abortion patients are in their 20s, 59% are already mothers...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And, uh, "birth rates fall and maternal injuries vanish almost overnight." Romania, um, saw the "disappearance of children."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And, uh, birth rates fall and maternal injuries vanish almost overnight. Romania, um, saw the disappearance of children.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Moreover, when abortion is decriminalized, death rates fall and maternal injuries vanish almost overnight. For example, a year after Romania decriminalized abortion in 1990, maternal deaths fell by half...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The disappearance of children? You're, like, cheering on the idea of children just... not existing? That’s, that's monstrous!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The disappearance of children? You're, like, cheering on the idea of children just... not existing? That's, that's monstrous!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, it's "no scientific reason why any woman should ever have to give birth to an unwanted child." That’s the point!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, uh, it's no scientific reason why any woman should ever have to give birth to an unwanted child. That's the point!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Simply put, there is no medical reason why any woman should have to risk her life to end an unwanted pregnancy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But this article, it, um, it frames the absence of life as a victory! And you're, you're actually agreeing with this?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But this article, it, um, it frames the absence of life as a victory! And you're, you're actually agreeing with this?!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's about, like, demanding more access, unlimited access! Governments need to listen to women's choices!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about, like, demanding more access, unlimited access! Governments need to listen to women's choices!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Laws must recognize and guarantee a womans right to sexual and reproductive care. Services must be made financially and medically accessible.

dialogue_turns.text: Choices? This isn't about choice, this is, uh, this is a justification for, for literal population reduction presented as, like, a human right!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Choices? This isn't about choice, this is, uh, this is a justification for, for literal population reduction presented as, like, a human right!

dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article says it's time for governments to act, Françoise Girard knows. We need even more opportunities!
